title: #76: The State of the World 2020
description:
It seems as if the Globalist leaders of the world circled 2020 on their calendars as the year of chaos. We have seen fires in Australia, people getting welded into their apartments in China, toilet paper shortages in the USA, riots, protests, elections, election fraud, and even threats of inbound asteroids and murder hornets.

One thing that we have not been seeing is any truth coming out of the mainstream media. They are co-conspirators in the most devious lie ever told to the general public about a virus that threatened to kill 65 million people, but never actually materialized.

As we look back on the insanity of 2020, one thing is for certain: it doesnâ€™t seem to be easing up anytime soon, and in fact, it seems to be just ramping up.
